  • Uses of Gradients in org.tensorflow.op

    Methods in org.tensorflow.op that return Gradients
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Gradients
    Ops.gradients(Iterable<? extends Operand<?>> y, Iterable<? extends Operand<?>> x, Gradients.Options... options)
    Adds gradients computation ops to the graph according to scope.
    Gradients
    Ops.gradients(Operand<?> y, Iterable<? extends Operand<?>> x, Gradients.Options... options)
    Adds operations to compute the partial derivatives of sum of ys w.r.t xs, i.e., d(y_1 + y_2 + ...)/dx_1, d(y_1 + y_2 + ...)/dx_2...
